channel.title: Please Help With 317 PI Jarring Error!

item.title: Please Help With 317 PI Jarring Error!
item.dc:creator: @tdmister45 tdmister45
item.description:
@tdmister45 wrote:

I’ve been trying to jar my client and kept getting an error saying, “Error connecting…trying again in…”. Then the jar wouldn’t close unless i restarted my computer. Now…I went into my signlink.java and changed the directory to the address dl link of the cache for it that I uploaded to dropbox. I was hoping it was going to work now, since i changed the cache directory to one that’s uploaded, but then I got this error.
THIS BATCH IS FOR DEBUGGING THE EXECUTABLE JAR ONLY
DOUBLE-CLICK THE “client.jar” TO RUN IT

Generated by: JAR Maker (http://www.goldenstudios.or.id/)

C:\Users\Dustin\Desktop>java -jar client.jar
cache.zip 271
java.io.FileNotFoundException: .\hybridpvpnetcache\Maps\mapConfig.txt (The syste
m cannot find the path specified)
at java.io.FileInputStream.open(Native Method)
at java.io.FileInputStream.(FileInputStream.java:146)
at java.io.FileInputStream.(FileInputStream.java:101)
at java.io.FileReader.(FileReader.java:58)
at client.setNewMaps(client.java:76)
at client.startUp(client.java:8459)
at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:33)
at client.run(client.java:5752)
at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:745)
java.util.zip.ZipException: error in opening zip file
at java.util.zip.ZipFile.open(Native Method)
at java.util.zip.ZipFile.(ZipFile.java:215)
at java.util.zip.ZipFile.(ZipFile.java:145)
at java.util.zip.ZipFile.(ZipFile.java:116)
at Update.unZipFile(Update.java:53)
at Update.(Update.java:29)
at client.streamLoaderForName(client.java:4467)
at client.startUp(client.java:8469)
at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:33)
at client.run(client.java:5752)
at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:745)

Please help? Btw…here’s my signlink file’s directory:

public static String findcachedir() { String as[] = {"./"}; if(storeid < 32 || storeid > 34) storeid = 32; String s = "hybridpvpnetcache"; for(int i = 0; i < as.length; i++) try { String s1 = as[i]; if(s1.length() > 0) { File file = new File(s1); if(!file.exists()) continue; } File file1 = new File(s1 + s); if(file1.exists() || file1.mkdir()) return s1 + s + "/"; } catch(Exception _ex) { } return null; } 
public static String sencondDir() {
	File file = new File("https://www.dropbox.com/s/5faa4aycijsq3en/hybridpvpnetcache.rar");
	if (!file.exists())
		file.mkdir();
	return file.toString();
}</blockquote>

Please help…

Ohhh, and it keeps trying to put a cache folder on my desktop…I don’t know why lol.

Read full topic
item.source: Please Help With 317 PI Jarring Error!
